short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browser experience with Comprehensify! An app that personalizes webpage text to match the reader's comprehension level!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with comprehensify! This Chrome extension personalizes webpage text based on your unique comprehension levels, adapting content to match your knowledge and learning goals. Ideal for educational enhancement across various content platforms.
